WorkItem.ClosedComment: Declined, we want the welcome window at all times. We may revisit this decision down the road but having it up is preventing a lot of issues from users
WorkItem.Description:
This was a nice option in Rawr2 that I used.     Failing that it would be nice to maybe have a list of the last few characters saved appear under the "open saved character" button in the welcome screen.
 
One other (very small) thing, it makes more sense to me (and perhaps only me) to have the buttons read :-
 
Import from Battle.net
Import from Rawr addon
Load saved character
 
instead of 
 
Load from Battle.net
Load from Rawr addon
Open saved character
 
 
Probably just me though :)
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Option to skip welcome screen unless it is a new version
